entry.def: Referral is the act of officially sending someone to a person or authority that is qualified to deal with them. A referral is an instance of this.

example.ex: Legal Aid can often provide referral to other types of agencies...
example.tran: 法律援助机构通常可以帮助引荐到其他类型的机构去。

example.ex: Ask your doctor for a referral to a clinical psychologist.
example.tran: 让你的医生给你推荐一位临床心理学家。

means.word_mean: 1. a recommendation to consult the (professional) person referred to;

sentences.sentence: "this patient is a referral from Dr. Bones"

means.word_mean: 2. the act of referring (as forwarding an applicant for employment or referring a matter to an appropriate agency)
